Traits.Name: Life Link
Traits.Description: All foes with this trait on the battlefield share the same health pool.

Traits.Name: Servitors
Traits.Description: At the first turn in the first round of combat, summon 4 wight in free adjacent spaces.

Traits.Name: Aura of the Endless Legion
Traits.Description: When any non-wight relict are defeated in range 3, summon a wight in an adjacent space to them.
